recruitment.title: Local recruitment
recruitment.description: Are you a young graduate in digital or engineering fields? Apply for an internship with us

digitalisation.title: Digitalization, Digital Transformation & Digital Design
digitalisation.description: Digital tools offer tremendous possibilities in improving processes across all business sectors. CompanyViene, through its VieneDesign service, offers to support you in your digital transformation, while taking care of data protection and cybersecurity aspects.

optimisation.title: Process Management Optimization (As-Is â†’ To-be)
optimisation.description: CompanyViene in this service proposes to support you in establishing a schematic state of existing Processes (AS-IS), which paves the way for a second stage of optimized, high value-added and simplified proposals (TO-BE).

durabilite.title: Sustainability & circular economies
durabilite.description: CompanyViene can help you measure and reduce your environmental impact by offering digital tools and solutions. This service also enables us to integrate the pillars of sustainability (environmental, economic and social) into our proposals, so that you can create sustainable, recyclable or reusable products.

performance.title: Energy performance of buildings
performance.description: Thanks to the VieneHouse service, CompanyViene can help you control consumption by integrating passive cooling concepts, enabling you to save up to 30% of your consumption due to the cooling needs of living spaces.

energie.title: Energy & Utilities - Electricity/Water/Gas
energie.description: CompanyViene offers support in the areas of energy, water and their efficient use. CompanyViene offers studies and solutions on the use of fossil fuels, combined with new renewable resources. EnerViene also offers analyses of the outlook for market needs.

hero.title: Learn more about
hero.description: CompanyViene is a company whose partners are engineers, IT specialists, and experts in various engineering fields with extensive international experience in the new technologies sector. Our partners are spread across a wide network of experts in France, Belgium, Gabon, Equatorial Guinea, Central African Republic, Cameroon, Congo, Senegal, and DRC.

objectives.title: Our
objectives.description: Provide our clients with simple solutions, optimize in relation to sustainability, to improve their service quality. The solutions proposed by CompanyViene are based on SMART project management tools. Our ambition is to add value through strengthening and training local staff while relying on European expertise at the international level.

development.title: Human Development
development.description: At the heart of CompanyViene's vision, the actions and undertakings initiated by the holding company are aimed at sustainably improving the well-being and fulfilment of individuals in their social environment through ingenious solutions with high added value.

sharing.title: Sharing
sharing.description: Inspired by systems that are widespread in most developing countries, Sharing is a way of working that enables a group of individuals to improve their living conditions through a better distribution of available goods.

simplicity.title: Simplicity
simplicity.description: The solutions offered by CompanyViene aim to be usable by all social classes. To achieve this, simplicity is one of CompanyViene's fundamental principles, enabling it to widen the scope of users of its products and services as much as possible.

equity.title: Equity
equity.description: Each shareholder of CompanyViene is an equal owner of the holding company. However, certain service providers may be involved at specific levels to provide us with their expertise. Equity is a sustainable model on which CompanyViene bases its positive impact on its customers.

profitability.title: Profitability
profitability.description: The search for profits and growth are essential to our investment and development strategies. CompanyViene aims to expand geographically, setting up operations in several target countries and creating value and jobs locally.

enerViene.title: EnerViene
enerViene.description: EnerViene is the Design Office of CompanyViene Holding. It brings together a vast network of engineers, computer scientists and technicians with specialisations in various sectors and professional experience in major international companies.
enerViene.strategy: EnerViene's strategy can be described in 3 main stages:
steps: In a second step, a detailed analysis of solutions is carried out (Proof of Validation) and KPIs are implemented
The third and final step consists of implementing Solutions adapted according to the filter of services and products in our portfolio (E-To-Be Customization)
enerViene.conclusion: This final step can also lead to the implementation of innovative and digital solutions.

vieneBusiness.title: VieneBusiness
vieneBusiness.description: VieneBusiness is the financing and project management structure in which CompanyViene is involved in the co-development of solutions and products in partnership with external players. It provides project leaders with real added value in the new technologies sector with support in terms of management, expertise and project financing.
vieneBusiness.additional: VieneBusiness is also responsible for implementing CompanyViene's CSR policy. The platform is responsible for managing donations and support for the most vulnerable. It enables CompanyViene's vision to be implemented on the basis of its 5 pillars: human development, sharing, simplicity, equity and profitability.

hero.title: Discover
hero.description: CompanyViene is positioned as a supplier of products and services designed to optimise and simplify its customers' management protocols.

VieneRegister.title: VieneRegister
VieneRegister.description: VieneRegister is a mobile application for smartphones (Android) designed and developed by our teams. It enables users to record useful information about the members of an organisation in a secure database using unique identification QR codes. Initially designed to meet the needs of workforce management in the education sector, it can also be used as a stock or process management application.
features: This easy-to-use product uses effective permissions management to assign one or more specific functions to a given user depending on their role in the organisation (registration, payment validation, database status check, data extraction into an Excel file, QR code scanning, card/receipt printing, etc.).
VieneRegister has a Robust Architecture that allows the product to evolve and adapt to customer needs thanks to its subtle set of Permissions.
A secure database on the Drive is available to our customers via this application.

CoolTrack.title: CoolTrack
CoolTrack.description: CoolTrack is a parcel tracking application. The application makes it easy to set up a system for tracking the status of bills of lading. Among other things, it can be used to manage the registration, withdrawal and invoicing of parcels or courier services by transport operators.

TMS.title: TMS
TMS.description: TMS is an application designed to manage passenger tickets for passenger transport. The application facilitates passenger check-in and invoicing, as well as keeping track of journeys made.

vieneDesign.title: VieneDesign
vieneDesign.description: VieneDesign is CompanyViene's digital service for designing corporate graphics, brand image, catalogue design, advertising design, user experience research and web and mobile application design. This offer is based on the expertise of our international teams and enables us to provide our customers with excellent value for money.

vieneHouse.title: VieneHouse
vieneHouse.description: VieneHouse is an architectural and civil engineering service in sustainable construction, its global position is to support our customers through the expertise of digital simulation in the construction of energy-efficient housing customer.
features: Thermal quality or comfort of ambient temperature
Automation of electrical energy via solar panels and recovery of thermal energy
Managing construction costs by assessing local resources and determining construction materials

description: Our team is here to help you and will get back to you as soon as possible.
You can also find us on social media or visit our office at the address below.

validation.nameFormat: The name must not contain numbers or special characters
validation.subjectFormat: The subject must not contain numbers or special characters

success.title: Thank you for contacting us!
success.description: We have received your message and will get back to you as soon as possible.

error.title: An error has occurred
error.description: We were unable to send your message. Please try again later.

notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.description: Sorry, the page you are looking for does not exist.

serverError.title: Server error
serverError.description: An error has occurred on the server. Please try again later.
